pages.text: Have you ever met one of those shady merchants that just appear on your lawn?$(p)Those are called $(9)Wandering Traders$().$(p)Typically they only sell hot garbage.

However, Apotheosis adds a ton of new trades to their tables so they are actually worth interacting with.$(p)These trades include items like $(9)Beacons$() or $(9)Totems of Undying$(), and heavily enchanted diamond gear.
